word: When select the entire document, click one the horizontal and vertical middle area of the text and then use ctrl-A to select all the text.
When typing font size: must press ctrl-A before typing.
When click dropdown of some button, must click the dropdown on the right side of the button.
If the entire row is already selected, please do not use the arrow keys on your keyboard to navigate to the last cell.
If the option is selected in the Word Software, the border woule be blue.
